attributes.action: Stop Muslims imposing the "Jizya" - That is a Poll Tax demanded by the Koran in Exchange to Live as a Non Muslim in Iraq
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime Minister please intervene and speak out for those whom are being forced to pay the "Jizya" , ie; a Poll Tax for Non Muslims in Iraq.
This is being enforced by Shia & Sunni Militias undermining the Principle of Fair law & Order for all peoples in Iraq.
Muslim peoples are not being forced to pay this Poll Tax , Only Non Muslims.
Christians & other peoples of faiths need Government Forces to Guard these areas populated by Non Muslims
